GET /api.description: responds with a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /events.description: responds with an array of all of the events

events.title: Paws in the Park
events.description: A fun-filled day in the park.

GET /api/events/:event_id.description: responds with the event object associated with the specified event_id

event.title: Paws in the Park
event.description: A fun-filled day in the park.

GET /api/events/:event_id/attendees.description: responds with an array of all of the attendees for the event with the specified event_id
